sentences.en: Because of Mount Zion which lies desolate, Foxes prowl in it.
sentences.cn: 哀5:18锡安山荒凉 、 野狗〔或作狐狸〕行在其上.

sentences.en: Gaby: Or a prowl around Marcel's room! What happened?
sentences.cn: 戈比: 或者是在马赛尔的房间游荡! 发生了 什么 ?

sentences.en: gangs of teenagers prowling the streets
sentences.cn: 在大街上鬼鬼祟祟四处游荡的少年团伙

sentences.en: He saw a hungry wolf on the prowl with his telescope.
sentences.cn: 他通过望远镜看到了一头四处觅食的饿狼.

sentences.en: In the evening I used to prowl about, hunting for diversion.
sentences.cn: 晚上我总是偷偷地溜出去, 想寻找一点消遣.

sentences.en: Look out for burglars on the prowl. If you see anything suspicious, call the police immediately.
sentences.cn: 小心巡视,提防盜贼,如有任何可疑情况, 马上打电话报警.

sentences.en: Many wild animals prowl at night looking for something to eat.
sentences.cn: 许多野生动物在晚上都四处徘徊寻找食物.

sentences.en: Robbers always prowl in this area, so you'd better not walk alone.
sentences.cn: 这里经常有寇盗出没, 你们最好不要单独行动.

sentences.en: salespeople on the prowl for better jobs.
sentences.cn: 四处寻觅更好的工作的推销员

sentences.en: Some youngsters were seen on the prowl around the street corner.
sentences.cn: 有人看到一些青年在街角徘徊.

sentences.en: The cat is on the prowl for mice.
The man was still on the prowl around the street at dead of night.
sentences.cn: 那男人夜深人静时仍在街上徘徊.

sentences.en: Their fellow travellers are a mix of honeymooners, single girls on the prowl and elderly couples.
sentences.cn: 他们的旅伴中有度蜜月的新人，有寻觅伴侣的单身女孩，也有老年夫妇。

sentences.en: There was a fox on the prowl near the chicken coop.
sentences.cn: 有只狐狸在鸡舍附近踅来踅去.

sentences.en: They return at evening, snarling like dogs, and prowl about the city.
sentences.cn: 到了晚上, 任凭他们转回.任凭他们叫号如狗, 围城绕行.

sentences.en: Tom looks like he is on the prowl again tonight.
sentences.cn: 看来汤姆今晚又要出去找女孩子逗乐了.

trans.tran_en: if someone is on the prowl, they are moving around different places, looking for an opportunity to do something
if an animal prowls, it moves around an area quietly, especially because it is hunting another animal

trans.tran_cn: （动物）潜行（为捕猎等），潜行（图谋不轨等），（因无聊、焦躁等）徘徊
